basics.name: Anjali Gopinathan Nair
basics.label: All things Cloud Native
basics.summary: An engineer with a love for Cloud native technology, Cyber Security, GitOps, loves debugging, Technical support, Infrastructure as Software

work.company: Aqua Security Software India Pvt Ltd
work.summary: Integrate security practices into the DevOps processes to ensure secure, compliant software development and deployment at Aqua Security Software.
highlights: Integrate security tools, frameworks, and processes into the CI/CD pipeline to ensure secure code deployment
Work closely with development, operations, and security teams to enhance and maintain a secure development lifecycle
Advocate for security best practices and help educate teams on secure coding and deployment practices
Assist in the detection, response, and remediation of security incidents and vulnerabilities
Develop and implement response strategies to mitigate risks and ensure swift recovery
Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulatory requirements, such as GDPR, HIPAA, and PCI-DSS

work.summary: Design, implement, and manage cloud infrastructure and services to drive digital transformation and optimize cloud solutions at Hitachi Vantara
highlights: Design, deploy, and manage scalable, reliable, and secure cloud infrastructure solutions
Utilize best practices for cloud architecture to ensure high availability and disaster recovery
Set up and manage monitoring and alerting systems to proactively identify and resolve issues
Automate cloud infrastructure and application deployment using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform, CloudFormation, or ARM templates
Implement and manage security controls to ensure the integrity and confidentiality of cloud resources
Perform regular maintenance and updates to ensure cloud environments are up-to-date and secure
Container image build, test and scan CI pipelines

work.summary: Provide comprehensive support for AWS cloud infrastructure, ensuring optimal performance, security, and availability for the organisation's cloud-based services
highlights: Monitor and manage AWS cloud infrastructure to ensure high availability and performance
Handle provisioning, configuration, and maintenance of cloud resources such as EC2, S3, RDS, and VPC
Perform root cause analysis and implement preventive measures to avoid recurrence of issues
Implemented encryption mechanisms for data-at-rest and data-in-transit using AWS KMS, SSL/TLS, and AWS Certificate Manager
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, AWS CodePipeline, and GitLab CI/CD for automated deployment and testing
Utilized scripting languages such as Python and Bash for automation of routine tasks and processes
Collaborate with development, operations, and security teams to integrate AWS solutions into the overall IT strategy
Set up monitoring and logging using CloudWatch, CloudTrail, and Elasticsearch for real-time visibility and analysis of AWS resources

Collaborated with development teams to integrate DevOps practices and tools into the software development lifecycle. Designed and implemented disaster recovery (DR) strategies and backup solutions using AWS services like AWS Backup, S3 versioning, and AWS Disaster Recovery services

education.institution: University of Hertfordshire, Hatfield, England, UK
Mahatma Gandhi University, Kottayam, Kerala, India
